title: S3
description: Amazon S3 and S3-compatible storage providers (46 providers supported)

oneOf.title: China Mobile Ecloud Elastic Object Storage (EOS)

env_auth.title: Use Environment Auth
env_auth.description: Get AWS credentials from runtime (environment variables or EC2/ECS meta data)

access_key_id.title: Access Key ID
access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key ID. Leave blank for anonymous access or runtime credentials

secret_access_key.title: Secret Access Key
secret_access_key.description: AWS Secret Access Key (password). Leave blank for anonymous access or runtime credentials

session_token.title: Session Token
session_token.description: AWS Session Token for temporary credentials

location_constraint.title: Location Constraint
location_constraint.description: Location constraint - must match the Region. Used when creating buckets only

acl.title: Canned ACL
acl.description: Canned ACL used when creating buckets and storing or copying objects

bucket_acl.title: Bucket ACL
bucket_acl.description: Canned ACL used when creating buckets. If empty, acl is used instead

sse_kms_key_id.title: KMS Key ID
sse_kms_key_id.description: If using KMS ID you must provide the ARN of Key

sse_customer_key_base64.title: SSE-C Key (Base64)
sse_customer_key_base64.description: Secret encryption key in base64 format for SSE-C

storage_class.title: Storage Class
storage_class.description: Storage class to use when storing new objects

upload_cutoff.title: Upload Cutoff
upload_cutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload. Maximum is 5GB

max_upload_parts.title: Max Upload Parts
max_upload_parts.description: Maximum number of parts in a multipart upload

copy_cutoff.title: Copy Cutoff
copy_cutoff.description: Cutoff for switching to multipart copy

disable_checksum.title: Disable Checksum
disable_checksum.description: Don't store MD5 checksum with object metadata

shared_credentials_file.title: Shared Credentials File
shared_credentials_file.description: Path to the shared credentials file

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Profile to use in the shared credentials file

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: Use path style access instead of virtual hosted style

use_accelerate_endpoint.title: Use Accelerate Endpoint
use_accelerate_endpoint.description: Use AWS S3 Transfer Acceleration endpoint

leave_parts_on_error.title: Leave Parts on Error
leave_parts_on_error.description: Don't delete incomplete multipart uploads on error

use_dual_stack.title: Use Dual Stack
use_dual_stack.description: If true use AWS S3 dual-stack endpoint (IPv6 support)

use_arn_region.title: Use ARN Region
use_arn_region.description: If true, enables arn region support for the service

list_chunk.title: List Chunk
list_chunk.description: Size of listing chunk (response list for each ListObject S3 request). Also known as MaxKeys, max-items, or page-size

list_version.title: List Version
list_version.description: Version of ListObjects to use: 1, 2 or 0 for auto

list_url_encode.title: List URL Encode
list_url_encode.description: Whether to url encode listings: true/false/unset. Some providers support URL encoding listings for more reliable handling of control characters in file names

no_check_bucket.title: No Check Bucket
no_check_bucket.description: If set, don't attempt to check the bucket exists or create it

no_head.title: No Head
no_head.description: If set, don't HEAD uploaded objects to check integrity

no_head_object.title: No Head Object
no_head_object.description: If set, do not do HEAD before GET when getting objects

disable_http2.title: Disable HTTP/2
disable_http2.description: Disable usage of http2 for S3 backends

download_url.title: Download URL
download_url.description: Custom endpoint for downloads. Usually set to a CloudFront CDN URL as AWS S3 offers cheaper egress for data downloaded through the CloudFront network

directory_markers.title: Directory Markers
directory_markers.description: Upload an empty object with a trailing slash when a new directory is created

use_multipart_etag.title: Use Multipart ETag
use_multipart_etag.description: Whether to use ETag in multipart uploads for verification. Should be true, false or left unset to use the default for the provider

use_presigned_request.title: Use Presigned Request
use_presigned_request.description: Whether to use a presigned request or PutObject for single part uploads

versions.title: Versions
versions.description: Include old versions in directory listings

version_at.title: Version At
version_at.description: Show file versions as they were at the specified time. Parameter should be a date (2006-01-02), datetime (2006-01-02 15:04:05) or a duration (eg 100d or 1h)

version_deleted.title: Version Deleted
version_deleted.description: Show deleted file markers when using versions

decompress.title: Decompress
decompress.description: If set this will decompress gzip encoded objects

might_gzip.title: Might Gzip
might_gzip.description: Set this if the backend might gzip objects. Should be true, false or left unset to use the default for the provider

use_accept_encoding_gzip.title: Use Accept Encoding Gzip
use_accept_encoding_gzip.description: Whether to send Accept-Encoding: gzip header. Should be true, false or left unset to use the default for the provider

no_system_metadata.title: No System Metadata
no_system_metadata.description: Suppress setting and reading of system metadata

use_already_exists.title: Use Already Exists
use_already_exists.description: Set if rclone should report BucketAlreadyExists errors on bucket creation. Should be true, false or left unset to use the default for the provider

use_multipart_uploads.title: Use Multipart Uploads
use_multipart_uploads.description: Set if rclone should use multipart uploads. Should be true, false or left unset to use the default for the provider

use_unsigned_payload.title: Use Unsigned Payload
use_unsigned_payload.description: Whether to use an unsigned payload in PutObject. Should be true, false or left unset to use the default for the provider

sdk_log_mode.title: SDK Log Mode
sdk_log_mode.description: Set to debug the SDK. Can be set to a comma separated list of functions: LogRequest, LogRequestWithBody, LogResponse, LogResponseWithBody, LogSigning, LogRetries, LogEventStreamBody, LogHTTP

directory_bucket.title: Directory Bucket
directory_bucket.description: Set to use AWS Directory Buckets

ibm_api_key.title: IBM API Key
ibm_api_key.description: IBM API Key to be used to obtain IAM token

use_x_id.title: Use X-ID
use_x_id.description: Set if rclone should add x-id URL parameters. Should be true, false or left unset to use the default for the provider

sign_accept_encoding.title: Sign Accept Encoding
sign_accept_encoding.description: Set if rclone should include Accept-Encoding as part of the signature. Should be true, false or left unset to use the default for the provider

sse_customer_key_md5.title: SSE Customer Key MD5
sse_customer_key_md5.description: If using SSE-C you may provide the secret encryption key MD5 checksum (optional). If left blank, this is calculated automatically from the sse_customer_key provided

requester_pays.title: Requester Pays
requester_pays.description: Enable requester pays option when interacting with S3 bucket

location_constraint.title: Location Constraint
location_constraint.description: Location constraint - must match the Region. Used when creating buckets only. Leave empty for us-east-1.

oneOf.title: Empty for US Region, Northern Virginia, or Pacific Northwest
Auto (R2 automatically distributes across Cloudflare data centers)

endpoint.title: Ceph Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Ceph Object Storage server

oneOf.title: US Cross Region Washington DC Private (s3.private.wdc.us.cloud-object-storage.appdomain.cloud)
US Cross Region San Jose Private (s3.private.sjc.us.cloud-object-storage.appdomain.cloud)
APAC Cross Regional Hong Kong Private (s3.private.hkg.ap.cloud-object-storage.appdomain.cloud)

location_constraint.title: Location Constraint
location_constraint.description: Location constraint for IBM COS buckets

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: IBM COS requires path style access

endpoint.title: SeaweedFS Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your SeaweedFS S3 server

oneOf.title: Use this if unsure. Will use v4 signatures and an empty region.
Use this only if v4 signatures don't work. E.g. pre Jewel/v10 CEPH.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Endpoint for your S3 compatible provider

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: Use path style access instead of virtual hosted style

v2_auth.title: Use V2 Auth
v2_auth.description: Use AWS v2 authentication (signature v2) - required for some older S3 implementations

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: China Mobile requires path style access

endpoint.title: Exaba Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Exaba Object Storage server

endpoint.title: FlashBlade Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Pure Storage FlashBlade Object Storage server

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: FlashBlade supports vhost but defaults to path-style

endpoint.title: Hetzner Endpoint
endpoint.description: Replace 'your-objectstorage.com' with your actual Hetzner object storage endpoint

endpoint.title: Netease Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Netease Object Storage server

endpoint.title: Rclone S3 Server Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Rclone S3 server

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.description: Rclone S3 server requires path style access

endpoint.title: SpectraLogic Endpoint
endpoint.description: URL of your Spectra Logic BlackPearl server

$comment: S3 backend supports 46 providers. Provider-specific fields (region, endpoint, storage_class) use oneOf with const/title for clean dropdown generation. The dependencies section conditionally shows appropriate fields based on selected provider.
